description: This file defines the NoteDetailsFragment class, which is an Android Fragment for viewing and editing a single note. It handles creating, updating, and deleting notes via interaction with the SupabaseClient, and communicates with its host activity through the NoteDetailsListener interface.

classes.name: NoteDetailsFragment
classes.description: Android Fragment for displaying and editing a note, with methods to handle user interactions like save and delete, and communicate updates back to the host activity/activity fragment.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Creates a new instance of NoteDetailsFragment, optionally with a Note argument.

methods.name: onAttach
methods.description: Ensures the host context implements NoteDetailsListener.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates layout, initializes views, and sets up event listeners.

methods.name: onSaveClicked
methods.description: Handles saving a new or existing note, interacting asynchronously with the Supabase client.

methods.name: onDeleteClicked
methods.description: Handles deleting the note if it exists, with confirmation dialog.
